First, we must install the package from github and load it into the environment

```{r setup}
# install.packages("devtools") 
# devtools::install_github("michelleUMD/multimix")
library(multimix)
```

We have included a sample dataset for your convenience. Data must be in **long** format. The columns required are `Subject_ID`, `Time`, and `Binary_outcome`

```{r}
data(sample_data)
head(sample_data)
```

To call the model, we use the `multimix` function. 

```{r}
mm_model <- multimix(sample_data)
```

We can view the model parameters by calling `print()`

```{r}
print(mm_model)
```

We can visualize the model by calling `plot()`

```{r}
plot(mm_model)
```
